trans-unit.source: Specifies text expression compiler settings.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the activity of the compiler settings.
The activity of the compiler settings.
Gets or sets the name of the activity for the compiler settings.
The name of the activity.
Gets or sets the namespace of the activity.
The namespace of the activity.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text expression compiler settings always generate source.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text expression compiler settings always generate source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref> is for implementation.
True of the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref> is for implementation; otherwise, false.
Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref> generates as partial class.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref> generates as partial class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the language used by the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref>.
The language used by the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref>.
Gets or sets the log source generation message for the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref>.
The log source generation message for the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref>.
Gets or sets the root namespace for the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref>.
The root namespace for the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings"></xref>.
